efs
v. 0.3.0
  1. org.efs.dispatcher.config
  2. ThreadAffinityConfig

Uses of Class
org.efs.dispatcher.config.ThreadAffinityConfig

Packages that use ThreadAffinityConfig
Package
Description
org.efs.dispatcher
Dispatcher forwards events to agents in an effectively single-threaded manner.
org.efs.dispatcher.config
This package provides typesafe configuration bean classes which may be loaded from a file as follows:
org.efs.timer
efs provides a high precision timer via EfsScheduledExecutor which provides a similar functionality as ScheduledExecutorService with the difference that expired timer tasks are dispatched to an efs agent's event queue.
org.efs.timer.config
Contains classes used to define EfsScheduledExecutors.
